DocumentNotes.Note:
This update of roundcubemail fixes one security issue and one bug.
- roundcubemail was updated to disallow unwanted access on files in the file system.
The apache2 configuration file for roundcubemail previously allowed access to the roundcubemail/bin folder and possibly /logs, /config and /temp, if these were not symlinks (this is only the case when manually changed).
This update comes with a fixed configuration. If you modified the file '/etc/apache2/conf.d/roundcubemail.conf', please replace it with the configuration 'roundcubemail.conf.rpmnew' and reapply your changes. After that, a restart of apache2 is requried.
- This update also fixes an issue that causes apache2 not to start because 'mod_version.c' is not loaded.
